item.title: Major winter storm threatens much of the U.S. with intense cold, snow and ice
item.description: As the storm moved east Sunday, around 60 million people, across 30 states from the Plains to the mid-Atlantic, were under weather alerts.

item.title: Amazon licenses Melania Trump documentary, as Jeff Bezos cozies up to president-elect
item.description: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos has had a contentious relationship with Donald Trump in the Washington Post. But things appear to have changed in recent mon...

item.title: Washington Post cartoonist quits after drawing of Bezos, other billionaires with Trump rejected
item.description: A rough sketch of the cartoon shows several men resembling corporate billionaires kneeling before a man wearing a suit and a long tie, representing Tr...

item.title: A year after Boeing's door plug accident, the aircraft giant faces a steep road to recovery
item.description: A year after a door plug blew out of a nearly new Boeing 737 Max 9, the manufacturer is outlining the progress it has made.

item.title: Investors head into next week with a cloudy January outlook and a looming jobs report
item.description: Wall Street is carefully watching to see how January shapes up, as it is the month that historically sets the tone for the rest of the year.
